name: Nine Circles: LD48
description:
NOTE: Made with RPG Maker XP - you will need the RTP in order to run it. (Link at the bottom for where to get it, if you need it.)
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
One person project for Ludum Dare 48. (My first game jam all on my own!)

Theme: Deeper and Deeper

    This is a small adventure rpg about a girl on a mission to see someone she loves again. Will she make it out?

    Mashing together the Greek Underworld and the Dante's Inferno version of Hell, this is an exploration of what it might be like to experience some of those locations. 

    Due to time constraints, only 3 of the circles are included (can you guess which ones they are?)

    Most assets are pulled from RPG Maker XP, aside from a few portraits and backgrounds made by myself.

    This was a very personal project for me, so I had a lot of fun making it. I hope you enjoy playing it just as much!

Thank you!

Controls:
Movement: Arrow Keys
Interact: Spacebar or Enter
Full Screen / Exit Full Screen: Alt + Enter

Get the RGSS-RTP here if you need it: https://www.rpgmakerweb.com/run-time-package
